content.question: Which of the following is the most likely explanation for Maesâ€™s inclusion of a map of the world in the painting?

choices.label: It reflected the ongoing Dutch military campaign against the Habsburgs.
It reflected the growing importance of overseas trade to Dutch society.
It reflected the increasing influence of Asian cultural contacts on Dutch art.
It reflected the territorial settlements of the Peace of Westphalia.

content.answer: It reflected the growing importance of overseas trade to Dutch society.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
